name: Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon
text: Dark Magician + any Blue-Eyes Monster. This monster must be fusion summoned from the extra deck using the fusion materials listed above and cannot be fusion summoned any other way. This cards fusion summon cannot be negated. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the fusion summoning of this card. This card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. Once per turn during either players turn when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect); you can discard a card from your hand, if you do negate the activation then target one card your opponent controls and if you do then bannish the targeted card, then if the card bannished by this effect was a monster destroy 1 card in your opponents hand, then if you did that this card also gains 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn you may target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it, and if you do; deal damage to the opponent equal to the original attack of the monster banished, and if you do that while this card was fusion summoned with 2 normal monsters; this card can make 2 attacks this turn.
